question: is consultation free
answer: Consultation fees may vary by lawyer. Please check their profile.

question: what is this website about
answer: LawSuits is a platform to connect users with verified lawyers for consultations and legal help.

question: how do I contact a lawyer
answer: You can visit a lawyer's profile and click on 'Request Consultation' or use the chat feature if available.

question: how do I create an account
answer: Click on 'Sign Up' from the home page and choose whether you are a user or a lawyer.

question: how do I login
answer: Click the 'Login' button from the homepage and enter your email and password.

question: what documents do I need to upload
answer: Users may upload case-related documents; lawyers should upload proof of legal qualification during registration.

question: how do I reset my password
answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password.

question: how are lawyers verified
answer: All lawyers are manually verified by our admin team using their bar registration and certifications.

question: can I chat with a lawyer
answer: Yes, once a lawyer accepts your consultation request, a chat window will be available.

question: how long does it take to get a reply
answer: Lawyers usually respond within 24 hours. You will be notified when they reply.

question: how can I delete my account
answer: You can request account deletion from your profile settings or contact support.

question: can I change my lawyer
answer: Yes, you can end the current consultation and send a new request to another lawyer.

question: how do I view my legal cases
answer: You can view your active and past cases from your dashboard under 'My Cases'.

question: do you offer legal aid for free
answer: Some lawyers may offer pro bono services. Check their profile or ask them directly.

question: is my data safe
answer: Yes, we use encrypted storage and strict access controls to protect your data.

question: how do lawyers register
answer: Lawyers can register using the 'Lawyer Sign Up' option on the homepage.

question: can I upload images or PDFs
answer: Yes, our platform supports secure uploads of PDFs, images, and documents.

question: do you have mobile support
answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works on all mobile devices.

question: can I review a lawyer
answer: Yes, after your consultation ends, you'll be asked to rate and review your lawyer.

question: do you have customer support
answer: Yes, you can reach out to our support team at support@lawsuits.com.

question: what happens after I request consultation
answer: The lawyer will review your request and either accept or decline. You’ll be notified accordingly.

question: can I see lawyer availability
answer: Yes, availability is shown on the lawyer's profile if they’ve updated it.

question: how do I upload case documents
answer: During a consultation request, you can attach documents related to your case.

question: are calls supported
answer: Currently, we support text chat. Audio/video call support may be added soon.

question: what types of lawyers are available
answer: We have lawyers specializing in criminal, civil, family, property, and more.
